headline: Roper Technologies to present at Morgan Stanley technology conference
summary: SARASOTA, Fla., Feb. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Roper Technologies, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROP) announced that it is presenting at the Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference on Tuesday, March 4, 2025 at 10:00 AM (Pacific Time) in San Francisco, CA. A link to the webcast presentation will be available in the “Investors” section of the Company’s website at www.ropertech.com.
